default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: I'm a free musician, a star of the streets! The genius saxophonist who never forgets a note... Echo, at your service! Now, aren't you excited to hear me play a tune after that introduction?

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: A mere few pages of sheet music are no challenge to me at all!

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: The saxophone genius is about to give the most spectacular performance! You won't want to miss it!

default.title: Level Start
default.text: This invigorating march will be the opening theme of our battle!

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: That marks the end of Echo's perfect performance, thank you!

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: Oops, I messed up the notes...

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: Listen to this wonderful, miraculous melody!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: It's so cold... so dark...

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Hey you, sleepyhead. Should I play a tune to wake you up?

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: Outfit, perfect. Stage, perfect. Saxophone, perfect! Okay, I'm ready to... Hey, don't touch my carefully arranged props! The ambiance matters to buskers too!

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: Hmm, hmm... Oh, I'm thinking of a new song! I once read a quote that says art is inspired by life. It's spot on! I'm immediately filled with inspiration after eating!

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: Slacking off? Of course not! I've memorized all those materials! Don't believe it? Quiz me then, I owe you one if I fail! If that's not enough, I can even recite the entire menu of the cafeteria for the past three weeks!

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: Well, I'm sure people just haven't noticed me yet. It happens to all the geniuses! I just know that as long as I keep playing, everyone will fall in love with my music one day!

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: Feeling down? Let me sing a song for you! Back in the orphanage, everyone loved my singing! Whenever I sang, people would laugh so happily! I wonder if my singing voice brings joy to others?

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: I hope my performances can touch many, many people! Being watched, admired, and remembered... means I'd never be forgotten or feel lonely again! Just thinking about it makes me so happy!

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: Don't tell anyone, but even a genius like me gets nervous when performing... But as soon as I feel your gaze from the audience, all my anxiety is gone, and my body is filled with strength! Because I know there's someone who'll always support me... Thank you, my number one fan!

default.title: Idle
default.text: Wow~ This place is really cozy, much warmer than the underpass! Let me try out this mattress!

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: Hey, hands off my Kute! ...Yeah, so what if I've named my saxophone? It's my precious friend!

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: Okay, okay, I know what you want! Here you go. Keep it safe though, the genius saxophonist's autograph is priceless!

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: Busking? That's my bread and butter! I've got this!

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: Weird... Why are the other buskers all shoving money at me and begging me to leave... Hmm, I must be too good at the saxophone!

default.title: Level Up
default.text: Is there more? I want more~

default.title: Deploy
default.text: Come! Let me show you what a true Saxophone genius sounds like!
